# contentViewController

**Instance Property**

The view controller for the window’s content view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentViewController: NSViewController? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property tracks the window’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/contentView] property.

## Accessing Window Attributes and Content

- **shouldCascadeWindows**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the window will cascade in relation to other document windows when it is displayed.
- **windowFrameAutosaveName**: The name under which the frame rectangle of the window owned by the receiver is stored in the defaults database.
- **synchronizeWindowTitleWithDocumentName()**: Synchronizes the displayed window title and the represented filename with the information in the associated document.
- **windowTitle(forDocumentDisplayName:)**: Returns the window title to be used for a given document display name.
- **dismissController(_:)**: Dismisses the window controller.
